hero.headline: The First 60 Seconds Decide the Deal.
hero.subheadline: VEXLO turns any prospect's domain into a scored sales verdict — in 30 seconds. No GA4. No permissions. No waiting.
hero.tagline: Generate branded, prospect-specific SEO proof in under 60 seconds. No access. No waiting. No skill gap in the room.
hero.microcopy: No credit card. First proof in 30 seconds.
hero.ann_sub: 17 of 50 founding member slots claimed. Lifetime deal at $149 — locked in forever.

value.section_headline: Your Close Rate Is Not a Skill Problem. It's a Proof Problem.
value.headline_main: Skill doesn't close deals. Proof does.
value.headline_italic: And you don't have it fast enough.
value.paragraph: Every SEO freelancer who lost a deal this month lost it before the proposal. Not after. The closing gap is a proof gap.

pain.headline: The dead loop that kills deals
pain.card_1_body: But the prospect doesn't trust you enough to grant it yet. The dead loop begins.
pain.card_2_body: Per domain. Before a single discovery call. That might not even close.
pain.card_3_body: The sentence that kills more pipeline than any price objection ever could.

problem.card_1_title: 45 minutes of manual work — per prospect
problem.card_1_body: Screenshots, exports, audit PDFs. All handcrafted. Not scalable. Not consistent. Not fast enough.
problem.card_2_body: Asking for GSC or GA4 access before trust is built hands control to the prospect before the deal is closed.
problem.card_3_title: You look solo. The deal goes to the agency.
problem.card_3_body: Perception gap kills deals. Skill without branded proof reads as amateur — regardless of your actual capability.

how_it_works.headline: Proof in under 60 seconds.
how_it_works.step_1_desc: No logins. No API keys. No access requests. Public data only.
how_it_works.step_2_desc: Ranking position, 30-day trend, AI Overview coverage, Proof Score 0–100. Branded with your identity.
how_it_works.step_3_desc: One link. One PDF. Decisive visual proof. The prospect sees data — not a pitch.

product_demo.headline: 30 seconds. One domain.
product_demo.subheadline: The power dynamic shifts: you walk in as the one delivering the verdict, not asking for permission.
product_demo.narrative_text: This domain shows a 12-position ranking decline over the last 30 days. Backlink profile is weak with only 23 referring domains. Google AI Overview has captured 34% of organic traffic for the primary keyword.

social_proof.testimonial_1_quote: I walked into the discovery call with their Proof Score. They signed that day. My close rate went from 18% to 41%.
social_proof.testimonial_2_quote: I used to pitch like a freelancer begging for trust. Now I pitch like an agency delivering a verdict. VEXLO changed how I sell.

features.headline: 10 weapons to
features.f1_does: Generate visual proof of a prospect's SEO vulnerability in <30 seconds from public data.
features.f1_why: You don't need GA4 or GSC access. Walk into the call with evidence, not requests.
features.f2_does: Visualize how much of a prospect's organic traffic Google AI Overview is capturing.
features.f2_why: Prospects don't know they're losing traffic. You're the first to show them.
features.f3_does: AI writes a closing narrative based on proof data — ready to read on the call.
features.f3_why: Turn raw data into a storyline the prospect can't ignore.
features.f4_does: A 0–100 score summarizing SEO vulnerability in one number anyone can understand.
features.f4_why: One number is more powerful than 20 slides. The prospect gets it instantly.
features.f5_does: Every proof report is stored and accessible anytime.
features.f5_why: Build a pitch database that grows in value every month.
features.f6_does: Customize logo, colors, and domain for every report you create.
features.f6_why: Clients see your agency brand, not VEXLO. Instant professionalism.
features.f7_does: A dedicated portal for clients to view proof reports and progress updates.
features.f7_why: Clients feel professionally managed. Retention increases.
features.f8_does: Every report has a unique link you can send before the call.
features.f8_why: Let the data 'warm up' the conversation before you speak.
features.f9_does: Strategic domains detected can be secured directly from VEXLO.
features.f9_why: Additional revenue stream. When domains 'live' in VEXLO, the relationship shifts from transactional to custodial.
features.f10_does: Daily briefing on ranking changes, AI Overview shifts, and new pitch opportunities.
features.f10_why: Never miss an opportunity. Every morning, you know who to call.

segments.seg_1_pain: Pitching without proof. Losing to bigger agencies.
segments.seg_2_pain: Need a weapon for discovery calls that close.
segments.seg_3_pain: Need infrastructure, not a tool that gets abandoned.

ai_overview.headline: Thousands of businesses are losing traffic.
ai_overview.body: Google AI Overview is already capturing organic traffic from thousands of local businesses today. VEXLO is the only platform that visualizes the damage in seconds.
ai_overview.cta: See AI Overview Impact Report Example

infrastructure.headline: Infrastructure, not a tool.
infrastructure.body: Client domains that live in VEXLO. A pitch archive that grows in value every month. Agency brand identity shaped here. This isn't a tool you use and forget.
infrastructure.metric_1_desc: Agency Pro users who activate domain integration.
infrastructure.metric_2_desc: Archive value grows every month — the longer you stay, the harder it is to leave.
infrastructure.metric_3_desc: For users with 3+ active domains on the platform.

pricing.roi_note: 50 founding members only. Price increases once seats are gone.
pricing.headline: Early access pricing.
pricing.ppp_desc: No subscription. Pay only when you need it.

certified.headline_2: Founding members of a new industry standard.
certified.body: Proof-First Certified Program — join the first cohort of agencies defining a new standard in SEO sales. LinkedIn badge. Exclusive access. A network money can't buy.

faq.headline: Common
faq.q1: What exactly is a Proof Report?
faq.a1: A branded, shareable document showing a prospect's current Google rankings, 30-day trend, Proof Score (0–100), AI Overview presence, and a 2-paragraph sales narrative — all generated from public data in under 60 seconds.
faq.q2: Do I need access to the prospect's Google Search Console?
faq.a2: No. Never. VEXLO uses only publicly observable ranking data. Zero credentials required from your prospect at any point.
faq.q3: How is this different from Ahrefs or SEMrush?
faq.a3: Ahrefs and SEMrush are post-sale research tools. VEXLO is a pre-sale closing weapon. Different job. Different moment. Different outcome.
faq.q4: Is the data accurate enough to show a client?
faq.a4: VEXLO uses the same public ranking signals agencies present in pitches daily. The disclaimer is built in: estimated public data for sales context — not certified analytics.
faq.a5: Agency Pro and Elite plans include custom brand kit: your logo, brand colors, and domain. The report reads as your agency's, not VEXLO's.
faq.a6: A 0–100 composite score: ranking position (40%), 30-day trend (30%), AI Overview presence (20%), keyword coverage (10%). Green = strong proof. Red = urgent pain.
faq.q7: What happens after founding slots are gone?
faq.a7: Pricing increases to public tiers. Founding members keep their rate permanently, regardless of future pricing changes.
faq.a8: Founding members get access first — before public launch. Expected Q2 2026. You'll receive a direct access link via email.
